88 struct NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGNAS tagged_heap_block {
89
93
94#pragma region Properties
95 private:
96 sz capacity_;
97 sz usage_;
98 u8* data_p_;
99
100 public:
101 tagged_heap_block* prev_p = 0;
102 tagged_heap_block* next_p = 0;
103#pragma endregion
104
108
109#pragma region Getters
110 public:
111 inline sz capacity() const { return capacity_; }
112 inline sz usage() const { return usage_; }
113 inline u8* data_p() const { return data_p_; }
114#pragma endregion
115
119
120#pragma region Constructors, Destructor and Operators
121 public:
122 inline tagged_heap_block(sz capacity) :
123 capacity_(capacity),
124 usage_(0),
125 data_p_((u8*)(this + 1))
126 {
127
128
129
130 }
131 ~tagged_heap_block() {
132
133
134
135 }
136#pragma endregion
137
141
142#pragma region Private Methods
143 private:
147 inline uintptr_t align_address(uintptr_t addr, sz align)
148 {
149 const sz mask = align - 1;
150 assert((align & mask) == 0 && "align value must be power of 2");
151 return (addr + mask) & ~mask;
152 }
156 template<typename data_type>
157 inline data_type* align_pointer(data_type* ptr, sz align)
158 {
159 const uintptr_t addr = reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(ptr);
160 return reinterpret_cast<data_type*>(align_address(addr, align));
161 }
165 inline u8* aligned_alloc(sz size, sz align)
166 {
167
168 const sz additional_size = sizeof(sz) + sizeof(native_allocator_i*);
169
170 sz actual_size = additional_size + size + align;
171
172 u8* raw_ptr = data_p_ + usage_;
173 usage_ += actual_size;
174
175 u8* additionized_ptr = raw_ptr + additional_size;
176
177
178
179 u8* aligned_ptr = align_pointer(additionized_ptr, align);
180
181 if (aligned_ptr == additionized_ptr)
182 aligned_ptr += align;
183
184
185
186 native_allocator_i** allocator_pp = reinterpret_cast<native_allocator_i**>(aligned_ptr) - 1;
187 *allocator_pp = &current_native_allocator();
188
189 *(reinterpret_cast<sz*>(allocator_pp) - 1) = actual_size;
190
191
192
193#ifdef NCPP_ENABLE_NATIVE_MEMORY_COUNTING
194 increase_native_used_heap_memory(actual_size);
195#endif
196
197 return aligned_ptr;
198 }
199
203 inline sz actual_size_aligned(void* ptr)
204 {
205
206 native_allocator_i** allocator_pp = reinterpret_cast<native_allocator_i**>(ptr) - 1;
207
208 sz actual_size = *(reinterpret_cast<sz*>(allocator_pp) - 1);
209
210 return actual_size;
211 }
212#pragma endregion
213
217
218#pragma region Public Methods
219 public:
223 inline bool is_full(sz offset) {
224
225 return usage_ + offset > capacity_;
226
227 }
228
232 inline u8* allocate(sz size, sz align) {
233
234 assert(size + sizeof(sz) + align + usage_ <= capacity_ && "block out of memory");
235
236 u8* result = aligned_alloc(size, align);
237
238 return result;
239 }
240
244 inline void reset() {
245
246
247
248#ifdef NCPP_ENABLE_NATIVE_MEMORY_COUNTING
249 decrease_native_used_heap_memory(usage_);
250#endif
251
252
253
254 usage_ = 0;
255 }
256#pragma endregion
257
258 };
259
260

279 template<
280 class allocator_type__
281 >
282 class NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGNAS tagged_heap_category_t {
283
287
288#pragma region Typedefs
289 public:
290 using allocator_type = allocator_type__;
291 using block_type = tagged_heap_block;
292#pragma endregion
293
297
298#pragma region Properties
299 private:
300 sz block_capacity_;
301 sz min_block_count_;
302
303 u32 block_count_array_[64];
304 block_type* head_block_p_array_[64];
305 block_type* tail_block_p_array_[64];
306 block_type* curr_block_p_array_[64];
307
308 allocator_type allocator_;
309#pragma endregion
310
314
315#pragma region Getters
316 public:
317 inline sz block_capacity() const { return block_capacity_; }
318 inline sz min_block_count() const { return min_block_count_; }
319
320 inline allocator_type& block_allocator() { return allocator_; }
321 inline const allocator_type& block_allocator() const { return allocator_; }
322#pragma endregion
323
327
328#pragma region Constructors, Destructor and Operators
329 public:
330 inline tagged_heap_category_t() :
331 block_capacity_(0)
332 {
333
334
335
336 }
337 inline tagged_heap_category_t(sz block_capacity, sz min_block_count) :
338 block_capacity_(block_capacity),
339 min_block_count_(min_block_count)
340 {
341
342 memset(block_count_array_, 0, sizeof(block_type*) * 64);
343 memset(head_block_p_array_, 0, sizeof(block_type*) * 64);
344 memset(tail_block_p_array_, 0, sizeof(block_type*) * 64);
345 memset(curr_block_p_array_, 0, sizeof(block_type*) * 64);
346
347 }
348 ~tagged_heap_category_t() {
349
350 for(u8 i = 0; i < 64; ++i)
351 internal_clear(i);
352
353 }
354#pragma endregion
355
359
360#pragma region Private Methods
361 private:
362 inline block_type* push_block() {
363
364 block_type* prev_block_p = tail_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()];
365
366 block_type* block_p = (block_type*)allocator_.allocate(sizeof(block_type) + block_capacity_);
367 new(block_p) block_type(block_capacity_);
368
369 block_p->prev_p = prev_block_p;
370
371 if (prev_block_p != 0)
372 prev_block_p->next_p = block_p;
373 else
374 head_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = block_p;
375
376 tail_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = block_p;
377 curr_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = block_p;
378 block_count_array_[pac::current_thread_index()]++;
379
380 return block_p;
381 }
382 inline block_type* pick_a_block(sz offset) {
383
384 while (block_count_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] < min_block_count_) {
385
386 push_block();
387 curr_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = head_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()];
388
389 }
390
391
392
393 block_type* block_p = curr_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()];
394
395 if (block_p == 0) {
396
397 block_p = push_block();
398
399 }
400 else {
401
402 while (block_p->is_full(offset)) {
403
404 if (block_p->next_p == 0) {
405
406 block_p = push_block();
407 break;
408
409 }
410
411 block_p = block_p->next_p;
412
413 }
414
415 }
416
417 curr_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = block_p;
418
419 return block_p;
420 }
421
422 inline void internal_clear(u8 thread_index) {
423
424 block_type* block_p = tail_block_p_array_[thread_index];
425
426 while (block_p != 0) {
427
428 block_type* block_prev_p = block_p->prev_p;
429 block_p->reset();
430 allocator_.deallocate((u8*)block_p, block_capacity_ + sizeof(block_type));
431 block_p = block_prev_p;
432
433 }
434
435 block_count_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = 0;
436 head_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = 0;
437 tail_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = 0;
438 curr_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = 0;
439
440 }
441
442 inline void internal_deallocate(u8 thread_index) {
443
444 block_type* block_p = tail_block_p_array_[thread_index];
445
446 while (block_p != 0 && block_count_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] > min_block_count_) {
447
448 block_type* block_prev_p = block_p->prev_p;
449 allocator_.deallocate(reinterpret_cast<u8*>(block_p), block_capacity_ + sizeof(block_type));
450 block_p = block_prev_p;
451
452 block_count_array_[pac::current_thread_index()]--;
453 tail_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = block_p;
454
455 }
456
457 curr_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()] = head_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()];
458
459 }
460 inline void internal_reset_blocks(u8 thread_index) {
461
462 block_type* block_p = tail_block_p_array_[thread_index];
463
464 while (block_p != 0) {
465
466 block_type* block_prev_p = block_p->prev_p;
467
468 block_p->reset();
469
470 block_p = block_prev_p;
471
472 }
473
474 curr_block_p_array_[thread_index] = head_block_p_array_[thread_index];
475
476
477
478 internal_deallocate(thread_index);
479
480 }
481#pragma endregion
482
486
487#pragma region Public Methods
488 public:
492 inline void clear() {
493
494 internal_clear(pac::current_thread_index());
495
496 }
500 inline void deallocate() {
501
502 internal_deallocate(pac::current_thread_index());
503
504 }
508 inline void reset_blocks() {
509
510 internal_reset_blocks(pac::current_thread_index());
511
512 }
513 inline u8* allocate(sz size, sz align) {
514
515 block_type* block_p = pick_a_block(size + sizeof(sz) + align);
516
517 return block_p->allocate(size, align);
518 }
519 inline block_type& head_block() {
520
521 return *head_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()];
522 }
523 inline block_type& tail_block() {
524
525 return *tail_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()];
526 }
527 inline block_type& current_block() {
528
529 return *curr_block_p_array_[pac::current_thread_index()];
530 }
531 inline u32 block_count() {
532
533 return block_count_array_[pac::current_thread_index()];
534 }
535#pragma endregion
536
537 };
538

558 template<
559 class allocator_type__ = NCPP_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR_TEMPLATE<u8>,
560 class category_cell_allocator_type__ = NCPP_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR_TEMPLATE<
561 containers::handle_map_cell_type<tagged_heap_category_t<allocator_type__>>
562 >,
563 class category_id_allocator_type__ = NCPP_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR_TEMPLATE<
564 containers::handle_map_id_type<tagged_heap_category_t<allocator_type__>>
565 >
566 >
567 class NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGNAS tagged_heap_t :
568 public native_heap
569 {
570
574
575#pragma region Typedefs
576 public:
577 using allocator_type = allocator_type__;
578 using block_type = tagged_heap_block;
579 using category_type = tagged_heap_category_t<allocator_type__>;
580 using category_cell_allocator_type = category_cell_allocator_type__;
581 using category_id_allocator_type = category_id_allocator_type__;
582 using category_map = containers::handle_map_t<category_type, category_id_allocator_type, category_cell_allocator_type>;
583 using category_id_type = typename category_map::id_type;
584 using category_cell_type = typename category_map::cell_type;
585#pragma endregion
586
590
591#pragma region Properties
592 private:
593 sz capacity_;
594
595 category_map category_map_;
596#pragma endregion
597
601
602#pragma region Getters
603 public:
604 inline sz capacity() const { return capacity_; }
605
606 inline category_map& get_category_map_() { return category_map_; }
607 inline const category_map& get_category_map_() const { return category_map_; }
608#pragma endregion
609
613
614#pragma region Constructors, Destructor and Operators
615 public:
616 inline tagged_heap_t(
617 sz capacity = NCPP_DEFAULT_TAGGED_HEAP_CAPACITY
618 ) :
619 capacity_(capacity),
620 category_map_(capacity)
621 {
622
623
624
625 }
626 inline tagged_heap_t(
627 const category_id_allocator_type& category_id_allocator,
628 const category_cell_allocator_type& category_cell_allocator,
629 sz capacity = NCPP_DEFAULT_TAGGED_HEAP_CAPACITY
630 ) :
631 capacity_(capacity),
632 category_map_(capacity, category_id_allocator, category_cell_allocator)
633 {
634
635
636
637 }
638 ~tagged_heap_t() {
639
640
641
642 }
643
644 inline tagged_heap_t(const tagged_heap_t&) = delete;
645 inline tagged_heap_t& operator = (const tagged_heap_t&) = delete;
646 inline tagged_heap_t(tagged_heap_t&&) = delete;
647 inline tagged_heap_t& operator = (tagged_heap_t&&) = delete;
648#pragma endregion
649
653
654#pragma region Public Methods
655 public:
656 inline category_id_type create_category(
657 sz block_capacity = NCPP_DEFAULT_TAGGED_HEAP_BLOCK_CAPACITY,
658 sz min_block_count = NCPP_DEFAULT_TAGGED_HEAP_MIN_BLOCK_COUNT_PER_CATEGORY
659 ) {
660
661 return category_map_.insert(category_type(block_capacity, min_block_count));
662 }
663 inline category_type& category(category_id_type handle) {
664
665 return category_map_.at(handle).item;
666 }
667 inline void delete_category(category_id_type handle) {
668
669 return category_map_.erase(handle);
670 }
671 inline u8* allocate(category_id_type category_id, sz size, sz align = 1) {
672
673 category_cell_type& category_cell = category_map_.at(category_id);
674
675 return category_cell.item.allocate(size, align);
676 }
677 inline void deallocate(category_id_type category_id) {
678
679 category_cell_type& category_cell = category_map_.at(category_id);
680
681 category_cell.item.deallocate();
682
683 }
684 inline void reset_blocks(category_id_type category_id) {
685
686 category_cell_type& category_cell = category_map_.at(category_id);
687
688 category_cell.item.reset_blocks();
689
690 }
691#pragma endregion
692
693 };

711#pragma region Allocators
712 template <class value_type__, class tagged_heap_type__ = tagged_heap_t<>>
713 class NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGNAS tgh_allocator_t :
714 public native_allocator_t<value_type__>
715 {
716
720
721#pragma region Typedefs
722 public:
723 using size_type = sz;
724 using difference_type = ptrdiff_t;
725 using pointer = value_type__*;
726 using const_pointer = const value_type__*;
727 using reference = value_type__&;
728 using const_reference = const value_type__&;
729 using value_type = value_type__;
730 using tagged_heap_type = tagged_heap_type__;
731 using tagged_heap_cid_type = typename tagged_heap_type::category_id_type;
732#pragma endregion
733
737
738#pragma region Properties
739 private:
740 utilities::lref_t<tagged_heap_type> tagged_heap_ref_;
741
742 tagged_heap_cid_type category_id_;
743#pragma endregion
744
748
749#pragma region Getters
750 public:
751 inline tagged_heap_type& tagged_heap() { return *tagged_heap_ref_; }
752 inline const tagged_heap_type& tagged_heap() const { return *tagged_heap_ref_; }
753
754 inline tagged_heap_cid_type category_id() const { return category_id_; }
755
756 inline b8 is_null() const { return tagged_heap_ref_.is_null(); }
757#pragma endregion
758
762
763#pragma region Constructors, Destructor and Operators
764 public:
765 inline tgh_allocator_t() :
766 tagged_heap_ref_(),
767 category_id_({ 0 })
768 {
769
770
771
772 }
773 inline tgh_allocator_t(tagged_heap_type& tagged_heap, tagged_heap_cid_type category_id) :
774 tagged_heap_ref_(tagged_heap),
775 category_id_(category_id)
776 {
777
778
779
780 }
781 inline tgh_allocator_t(const tgh_allocator_t& other) :
782 tgh_allocator_t((tagged_heap_type&)(*other.tagged_heap_ref_), other.category_id_)
783 {
784
785
786
787 }
788
789 inline tgh_allocator_t<value_type>& operator=(const tgh_allocator_t& other) {
790
791 tagged_heap_ref_ = other.tagged_heap_ref_;
792 category_id_ = other.category_id_;
793
794 return *this;
795 }
796
797 template <class other_value_type__>
798 inline tgh_allocator_t(const tgh_allocator_t<other_value_type__, tagged_heap_type>& other) :
799 tgh_allocator_t((tagged_heap_type&)other.tagged_heap(), other.category_id())
800 {
801
802
803
804 }
805
806 template <class other_value_type__>
807 inline tgh_allocator_t& operator=(const tgh_allocator_t<other_value_type__, tagged_heap_type>& other) {
808
809 tagged_heap_ref_ = other.tagged_heap();
810 category_id_ = other.category_id();
811
812 return *this;
813 }
814#pragma endregion
815
819
820#pragma region Methods
821 private:
822 inline pointer internal_allocate(size_type n, sz align = 1) {
823
824 assert(!tagged_heap_ref_.is_null() && "tagged heap is null");
825
826 return (pointer)(tagged_heap_ref_->allocate(category_id_, n * sizeof(value_type), align));
827 }
828
829
830
831 protected:
832 void* abstract_allocate(size_type size, sz align = 1) {
833
834 return (void*)internal_allocate(size / sizeof(value_type__), align);
835 }
836 void abstract_deallocate(void* ptr, sz size = sizeof(value_type__)) {
837
838
839 }
840
841
842
843 public:
844 inline pointer allocate(size_type n, sz align = 1) {
845
846 return internal_allocate(n, align);
847 }
848
849 inline void deallocate(void* p, sz n = 1) {
850
851
852 }
853
854 inline void reset_blocks() {
855
856 assert(!tagged_heap_ref_.is_null() && "tagged heap is null");
857
858 tagged_heap_ref_->reset_blocks(category_id_);
859
860 }
861 inline void deallocate_blocks() {
862
863 assert(!tagged_heap_ref_.is_null() && "tagged heap is null");
864
865 tagged_heap_ref_->deallocate(category_id_);
866
867 }
868
869 inline pointer address(reference x) const { return &x; }
870 inline const_pointer address(const_reference x) const { return &x; }
871 inline void destroy(pointer p) { p->~value_type(); }
872
873 inline size_type max_size() const { return size_t(-1); }
874
875 template <class U>
876 struct rebind { typedef tgh_allocator_t<U> other; };
877#pragma endregion
878
879 };
880#pragma endregion
881

883
884 using tagged_heap = tagged_heap_t<>;
